iti64:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti64:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these three kinds of bad conduct.
iti64:2.3: Bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
iti64:2.4: These are the three kinds of bad conduct.”
iti64:4.3: when their body breaks up, that witless person
iti64:5.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
